name: CLAUDE.md Doctor
description: Diagnose and improve CLAUDE.md files and .claude/rules/
longDescription:
Scans all project instruction files (`CLAUDE.md`, package-level overrides, `.claude.local.md`, `.claude/rules/`) across **8 diagnostic checks**:

- Command accuracy, architecture clarity, token efficiency (<300 lines), actionability
- Currency, gotcha coverage, rule modularity, frontmatter correctness

Produces a scored health report with file-by-file grades and severity-classified findings (critical/warning/low). Offers **4 triage modes**: fix all, critical-only, per-fix approval, or report-only. Includes 4 reference docs covering anti-patterns, quality criteria, rules-specific criteria, and templates.
